description: What drink best captures the spirit of Thanksgiving? It's tough to say, but Salted Caramel White Russian might be it. It's sweet and rich with just enough&nbsp;alcohol to cut through the richness. Plus, you can make it ahead of time, so there is no last-minute fuss when your guests arrive!
keywords: Salted Caramel White Russian Cocktail Recipe
How To Salted Caramel White Russian
name: Salted Caramel White Russian

recipeInstructions.name: Swirl ½ of the caramel sauce around the inside of a tall glass or mason jar. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.text: Swirl ½ of the caramel sauce around the inside of a tall glass or mason jar. Set aside.

recipeInstructions.name: Add the vodka, Kahlua, and ice to a shaker. Shake vigorously, then strain over fresh ice cubes.
recipeInstructions.text: Add the vodka, Kahlua, and ice to a shaker. Shake vigorously, then strain over fresh ice cubes.

recipeInstructions.name: Swirl extra caramel sauce and sprinkle some ground sea salt.
recipeInstructions.text: Swirl extra caramel sauce and sprinkle some ground sea salt.
